Package Database

Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
Database.DatabaseHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
BranchDBHelper, MenuDBHelper, OrderDBHelper, PaymentMethodDBHelper, UserDBHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
generic database helper for serializing and deserializing objects to/from a serialized file.
